queries.nql: src event_type = "alert" | aggr countAlerts=count(event_type) unwind=true | limit 1000
src event_type = "anomaly" | aggr countAnomalies=count(event_type) unwind=true | limit 1000
src event_type = "dns" | aggr countDns=count(event_type) unwind=true | limit 1000
src event_type = "http" | aggr countHttp=count(event_type) unwind=true | limit 1000
src event_type = "tls" | aggr countTls=count(event_type) unwind=true | limit 1000

hideTooMuchData.message: To protect the browser performance, a limit of output records has been imposed on the widget. Please apply filters or narrow down the analysed time frame to display the results.

queries.nql: (valInColl(event_type, "1c9bc126-04224e68-af16f547_0_event_type_bucket-limit", "event_type") OR event_type = null) | timeAggr countEvent_type=count(event_type) on timestamp by event_type as event_type interval="${AUTOBUCKET_INTERVAL}" dir="desc" unwind=true bucketAlias="srcEventTimestamp" | limit 100

subpipes.nql: ${LIMIT_SOURCE} | neq(null, event_type) | aggr countEvent_type=count(event_type) by event_type as event_type unwind=true | sort countEvent_type desc | limit 10 | dst "1c9bc126-04224e68-af16f547_0_event_type_bucket-limit"

queries.nql: src event_type = "alert" | aggr countSeverity=count(alert_severity) by alert_severity as alert_severity unwind=true | sort countSeverity desc | limit 10

queries.nql: aggr countType=count(event_type) by event_type as event_type unwind=true | sort countType desc | limit 10

hideTooMuchData.message: To protect the browser performance, a limit of output records has been imposed on the widget. Please apply filters or narrow down the analysed time frame to display the results.

queries.nql: src event_type = "alert" | aggr countAction=count(alert_action) by alert_action as alert_action unwind=true | sort countAction desc | limit 10

queries.nql: src event_type = "alert" | aggr event_category=first(event_category), minSeverity=min(alert_severity), countSig=count(event_signature) by event_signature as event_signature unwind=true | sort countSig desc | limit 50

hideTooMuchData.message: To protect the browser performance, a limit of output records has been imposed on the widget. Please apply filters or narrow down the analysed time frame to display the results.

queries.nql: aggr uniqueSigs=dc(event_signature), countSrc=count(src_ip) by src_ip as src_ip unwind=true | sort countSrc desc | limit 50

queries.nql: aggr uniqueSigs=dc(event_signature), countDst=count(dest_ip) by dest_ip as dest_ip unwind=true | sort countDst desc | limit 50
